name: PioParkour
description:
This is a litlle "prototype" of a game I had in mind that I started quite some months ago.

I've been programming for around 2 years now, but I started this project like 1 year ago, so it isn't very good, and the controls are kinda weird, but I don't think they're hard to get used to.

I thought it was about time I released something, so I'm releasing this raw version of my most "complete" project (even tho it doesn't have much levels).

Hope you enjoy! :)

(The game doesn't have an actual end, but it has a big level with no ending, kinda like a playground. Consider that the end :D)

(Hit the number 1 key inside the game for something)
